ü§î‚úçüèæ I‚Äôve got an impending blog post expounding on this subject ‚Äúcoming soon‚Ñ¢‚Äù

It‚Äôs important to note:

Mastodon =/= Fediverse; Fediverse == #Mastodon, #Pixelfed, #Write.as, #Micro.blog, #Pleroma, #Peertube, #Lemmy etc.

There‚Äôs a whole breadth of components that plug into this ecosystem and each one has its own strengths and weaknesses. Its pretty easy to imagine journalists using more than one tool that can get the job done
‚Äì @starrwulfe@public.garden
